Title: Tarzan & Jane
Director: Steve Loter, Victor Cook, Don MacKinnon, Lisa Schaffer(co-director)
Writer: Edgar Rice Burroughs ("Tarzan" stories), Bill Motz, Bob Roth, Mirith J. Colao, John Behnke, Rob Humphrey, Jim Peterson, Jess Winfield, Jess Winfield (story), Dave Bullock (story), Adam Van Wyk (story)
Actors: Michael T. Weiss, Olivia d'Abo, Jeff Bennett, Jim Cummings
Plot: After being married an entire year, Jane thinks back on some of her and Tarzan's adventures as she seaches for something special to mark the occasion with.
